ðŸ“– Summary: The VideoSeal repository provides an open and efficient solution for video watermarking. It includes pre-trained models, training and inference code, and evaluation tools. The repository also offers baselines of state-of-the-art image watermarking models adapted for video, enabling users to easily embed and detect watermarks in video content.
